Calling the packages 

```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr) # manipulate dataframes
library(readr) # read/write dataframes
library(ggplot2) # making plots
```

Import the crime data
```{r}
library(lubridate)

bmore_crime_data_6_22 <- read_csv("bmore crime data_6_22.csv") 

```
View(bmore_crime_data_6_22)

x. Making a visual w ggplot 
```{r layout="l-body-outset"}
ggplot(bmore_crime_data_6_22) +
  aes(x = District, y = )
  geom_point(size = 0.5, alpha = 0.25) +
  geom_smooth() +
  theme_minimal()
```
